description_en: Breakdown of monthly unemployed figures by duration of unemployment.
description_ms: Pecahan angka penganggurann bulanan mengikut tempoh pengangguran.
methodology_en: This data is produced based on the Labour Force Survey (LFS), which is designed to collect representative data on the labour force at national and state level. Consistency in methodology has been maintained to ensure that the data is comparable over time. Survey findings are a monthly, quarterly and annual basis. For a full description of the methodology, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/lfs-technotes).
methodology_ms: Data ini dihasilkan berdasarkan Survei Tenaga Buruh (STB), yang bertujuan untuk mengumpul data tentang tenaga buruh di peringkat nasional dan negeri. Metodologi survei ini dipastikan konsisten untuk mendapatkan perbandingan statistik siri masa. Data daripada survei ini diterbitkan secara bulanan, suku tahunan dan tahunan. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila merujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/lfs-technotes).
caveat_en: Data prior to 2025 is compiled in concordance with population data from the 2010 Census. Data from 2025 onwards is compiled in concordance with population data from the 2020 Census. As such, you may observe a trend break in the series due to the different references used. Furthermore, sums of each category may not always equal to the totals shown in related tables because of independent rounding to one decimal place. However, the differences are not obvious.
caveat_ms: Data sebelum 2025 dianggarkan berdasarkan data penduduk daripada Banci 2010. Data dari 2025 dan seterusnya dianggarkan berdasarkan data penduduk daripada Banci 2020. Oleh itu, anda mungkin akan melihat *trend break* dalam siri masa disebabkan oleh penggunaan rujukan yang berbeza. Selain itu, hasil tambah bagi sesuatu kategori mungkin tidak sentiasa sama dengan jumlah yang ditunjukkan dalam jadual yang berkaitan kerana pembundaran secara bebas kepada satu titik perpuluhan. Walau bagaimanapun, perbezaan ini tidak ketara.
publication_en: The [Labour Force Report, May 2025](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/labour_month_2025-05), the latest edition of the monthly labour force statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on the labour force](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/labour-market).
publication_ms: [Laporan Tenaga Buruh, Mei 2025](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/labour_month_2025-05), edisi terkini bagi statistik tenaga buruh bulanan yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang tenaga buruh](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/labour-market).

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 since the data is at monthly frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD ditetapkan sebagai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: unemployed
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who did not work but were looking for work or available to work
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang tidak bekerja tetapi sedang mencari kerja atau bersedia untuk bekerja

fields.name: unemployed_active
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who were unemployed, but were actively looking for employment
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang tidak bekerja tetapi aktif mencari kerja

fields.name: unemployed_inactive
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who were unemployed, but were not actively looking for employment due to waiting for ongoing job application results, being ill or believing that there was no work they could have successfully applied for
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang tidak bekerja, tetapi tidak aktif mencari kerja kerana menunggu keputusan aplikasi kerja semasa, tidak sihat, ataupun kerana percaya tiada pekerjaan yang mereka layak untuk penuhi

fields.name: unemployed_active_3mo
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who have been actively unemployed for less than 3 months
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang menganggur secara aktif bagi tempoh kurang daripada 3 bulan

fields.name: unemployed_active_6mo
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who have been actively unemployed for between 3 to 6 months
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang menganggur secara aktif bagi tempoh 3 hingga 6 bulan

fields.name: unemployed_active_12mo
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who have been actively unemployed for between 6 to 12 months
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang menganggur secara aktif bagi tempoh 6 hingga 12 bulan

fields.name: unemployed_active_long
fields.description_en: [Float] The number (in thousands) of people who have been actively unemployed for more than 12 months
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah (dalam ribuan) orang yang menganggur secara aktif bagi tempoh lebih daripada 12 bulan
